attributes.action: desolve the house of commons and lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people ask that the house of commons and lords be desolved that you form a twelve man steering committee ware you would present polices for the people to vote. inital cost would be the ability for all citizens to vote on the issues of the day therefore giving the world the first true democracey

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
